overview: An early experiment by Dominique Belloir and Rainer Verbizh on Marcel Dupouy's Movicolor synthesizer, from footage of waves recorded a few weeks earlier from the top of a rock on the pink granite coast in Brittany: "A small research unit had been installed by Marcel Dupouy, CNAV [...]  I was responsible for receiving artists or directors interested in this new electronic image synthesizer. Jean-Luc Godard was one of the first visitors..." -Belloir
title: Fluides
